item.title: BGB deployed in Mirpur
item.description: The Border Guard Bangladesh (BGB) has been deployed in Mirpur on the first day of the election campaign. The BGB said in a message that the move aims to preserve law and order ahead of the parliamentary polls. The BGB personnel have been deployed only in Mirpur.
